tool_description: Detect face and return personal information from Thai National ID card
name: Thai ID Card OCR - Front
title: Thai ID Card OCR - Front

api_list.name: Thai ID Card - front
api_list.description: Detect face and return personal information from Thai National ID card
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://thai-id-card-ocr-front.p.rapidapi.com/api/v1/idcard-front/"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "thai-id-card-ocr-front.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

import requests

url = "https://thai-id-card-ocr-front.p.rapidapi.com/api/v1/idcard-front/"

            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
